lead_paragraph: A forgotten Robert Frost manuscript recently turned up in the basement of a Masonic lodge in Methuen, Mass.
snippet: A forgotten Robert Frost manuscript recently turned up in the basement of a Masonic lodge in Methuen, Mass.

headline.main: Absent From School? Frost Kept Track
